titleStmt.title: A seasonable preparation for death and eternity, or, Funeral considerations, &c. Being the substance of a discourse occasionally on the D. of G------, a noble peer, who received his mortal wound at the siege of Cork in Ireland. With a prayer suitable to the occasion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Title within heavy black mournign border; vignette: corpse in coffin.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
